typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		att_6_id as string,
		att_4_id as string,
		dim_6 as string,
		dim_4 as string,
		period as long,
		att_2_id as string,
		dim_2 as string,
		att_3_id as string,
		amount4 as long,
		dim_7 as string,
		dim_3 as string,
		att_1_id as string,
		dim_1 as string,
		amount as long,
		att_7_id as string,
		client as string,
		currency as string,
		account as string,
		cur_amount as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select * from dwh_stage.s_udv_gltrans_agg_allvouc',
	format: 'query') ~> sUdvGLtransAggAllvouc
source(output(
		status as string,
		client as string,
		period as long,
		date_from as date,
		date_to as date,
		cons_period as long,
		fiscal_year as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select * from dwh_stage.s_udv_periods\nwhere substring(STR(cons_period),1,4)>=\'2014\'',
	format: 'query') ~> sUdvPeriods
source(output(
		client as string,
		amount_currency as string,
		amount4_currency as string,
		client_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select * from dwh_stage.s_udv_clientinfo',
	format: 'query') ~> sUdvClientinfo
source(output(
		dim_position as string,
		dim_value as string,
		attribute_name as string,
		client as string,
		status as string,
		attribute_id as string,
		dim_description as string,
		attribute_description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select * from dwh_stage.s_udv_dim_value\nwhere attribute_id=\'N0\'',
	format: 'query') ~> sUdvDimvalue
source(output(
		code_type as string,
		source_code_key as string,
		target_code as string,
		target_description as string,
		code2 as string,
		om_x_ref as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select code_type,\n            source_code_key,\n            target_code,\n            target_description,\n            code2,\n            om_x_ref\n       from dwh_stage.t_crossreference\n      where source_system = \'AGRESSO\' and code_type_id = 464\n',
	format: 'query') ~> xrefCapitalbranch
source(output(
		code_type as string,
		source_code_key as string,
		target_code as string,
		target_description as string,
		code2 as string,
		om_x_ref as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select code_type,\n            source_code_key,\n            target_code,\n            target_description,\n            code2,\n            om_x_ref\n       from dwh_stage.t_crossreference\n      where     source_system = \'AGRESSO\'\n            and code_type_id= 116\n            and trim(source_code_key) not in (\'80\', \'70\')\n',
	format: 'query') ~> xrefCapital
source(output(
		code_type as string,
		source_code_key as string,
		target_code as string,
		target_description as string,
		code2 as string,
		om_x_ref as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select code_type,\n            source_code_key,\n            target_code,\n            target_description,\n            code2,\n            om_x_ref\n       from dwh_stage.t_crossreference\n      where source_system = \'CC\'                                \n  and code_type_id = 793\n',
	format: 'query') ~> xrefBusinessarea
sUdvGLtransAggAllvouc, sUdvPeriods join(sUdvGLtransAggAllvouc@period == sUdvPeriods@period
	&& sUdvGLtransAggAllvouc@client == sUdvPeriods@client,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> transper
transper, sUdvClientinfo join(sUdvGLtransAggAllvouc@client == sUdvClientinfo@client,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> clients
clients, sUdvDimvalue join(sUdvGLtransAggAllvouc@client == sUdvDimvalue@client
	&& dim_2 == dim_value,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> dimvalue
dimvalue derive(clientkey = concat(toString(sUdvGLtransAggAllvouc@client),
 ' - ',
 case(
    sUdvGLtransAggAllvouc@client=='30'&&dim_1=='11',
     '10',
      dim_1
      ))) ~> clientkey
clientkey, xrefCapitalbranch join(clientkey == source_code_key,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> xrefcaprbnch
xrefcaprbnch, xrefCapital join(sUdvGLtransAggAllvouc@client == xrefCapital@source_code_key,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> xrefcapitals
xrefcapitals, xrefBusinessarea join(dim_value == xrefBusinessarea@source_code_key,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> xreflineofbusiness
xreflineofbusiness select(mapColumn(
		dim_4,
		amount4,
		dim_3,
		account,
		agr_reporting_period = sUdvPeriods@period,
		date_from,
		date_to,
		cc_reporting_period = cons_period,
		branch_code = xrefCapitalbranch@target_code,
		capital_code = xrefCapital@target_code,
		hrg_code = xrefBusinessarea@target_code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> droppingcolumns
